name: Stud.ip Dark
description:
Dark grey/black theme for Stud.IP with red elements.
I only applied a few personal changes and updates for a newer version of Stud.IP to https://userstyles.org/styles/101211/ostfalia-studip-dark, most credit for this theme goes to CaiusCaligulaCC

If you have any issues with this style, please open a ticket at https://github.com/NiklasGollenstede/stylish
